text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Identifying information" means information that reveals the identity or location of an individual.

section.section:
"Parent" means an individual who, at any time before a court enters an order for adoption under this subtitle:
meets a criterion in § 5-3B-05(a) of this subtitle; or
is the mother.
"Parent" does not include an individual whom a court has adjudicated not to be a father or mother.

text.section: "Prospective adoptee" means an individual who is the subject of a petition for adoption under this subtitle.
